title: What grade should sex education be taught in schools? - Quora

response.answer_text: Second term of fifth grade. Fifth grade, in most of the USA, is the last grade in which the students, for the most part, stay together in one class room. Then in 6th grade, as the hormones are starting to percolate, the students are in Middle School which is like a large high school. In our town, seven elementary schools dumped into one Middle School. You need the students to be Aware of sex education in a professional and consistent fashion before that happens. Eleven years old in second term of fifth grade. Perfect. Before they are exposed to free-range Eighth graders the following year……
